title: ATLYSS Directly Download
description:
Enter ATLYSS, a strange world thriving with creatures and critters. With the outside realm and dungeons deep ahead, there will be plenty of locations to explore and discover. Three primary classes to choose Start off as a witty novice, destined to choose between three primary classes: Apocalypse Party
– Play alone, or with Friends – ATLYSS is made around net-play, but can also be played offline as well with no opportunities or features lost Character Customization Make your character with five races to choose from, with color, head, and body sliders. All of your character progression data is saved locally and easily accessed within the game’s data directory. Play a character in single-player, and join in later to a net-play session where you left off, and vice versa. Party up with friends and take on quests to kill creatures, discover new locations, and help the last remaining safe haven of the world.

game_info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Early Access
